XXXisEnabled

public boolean XXXisEnabled(string $strConfigPath, mixed $strDefault=null)

_getConfigObject

protected array _getConfigObject(string $objectString, array $config)

Returns the value/properties of a TS-object as given by $objectString, eg. 'options.dontMountAdminMounts' Nice (general!) function for returning a part of a TypoScript array!

Parameters

$config -
